title: Workshop on Understanding Economic Policy and Practicing Monetary Policy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental economic concepts (e.g., inflation, interest rates)
context.additional_context: Emphasis on participatory learning through analysis of real-life economic issues.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key indicators used in monetary policy decision-making (e.g., CPI, employment indicators) with 80% accuracy
Learners can deliver a 5-minute presentation on a virtual monetary policy scenario through small-group activities
Learners can write policy reports reflecting real-world economic conditions through team-based collaboration
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
